tit.e: Gari (slices of ginger pickled in sweetened vinegar)
tit.cmt: slices of ginger pickled in sweetened vinegar をpickled ginger に修正しました。

sen.j: ガリとは、生姜を薄く切って甘酢漬けにしたもの。
sen.e: Gari is a slices of ginger pickled in sweetened vinegar.
Gari is ginger thinly sliced and pickled in sweetened vinegar.
sen.cmt: a slices of ginger を ginger thinly sliced and に修正しました。
sen.e: Gari is ginger thinly sliced and pickled in sweetened vinegar.

sen.j: 寿司には欠かせない付け合わせである。
sen.e: It is an essential relish for sushi.
It is an essential relish for sushi.
It is an essential relish for sushi.

sen.j: 歯触りのよい食感に、さっぱりとした辛味と甘酸っぱい味がする。
sen.e: It has crispy touch and texture, refreshing and piquant taste, with sweet-sour flavor.
It has crispy touch and texture, refreshing and piquant taste, with sweet-sour flavor.
It has crispy touch and texture, refreshing and piquant taste, with sweet-sour flavor.

sen.j: 魚の臭みを消してくれるので、寿司を一貫食べた後につまむと舌が新しくなって次がおいしく食べられる。
sen.e: It cleans away fishiness and refreshes your tongue, so if you have gari after eating one dish of sushi, you can enjoy next sushi more deliciously.
As it removes fish smell, a bite of gari after eating a piece of sushi refreshes your tongue and you can enjoy the next piece.
As it removes fish smell, a bite of gari after eating a piece of sushi refreshes your tongue and you can enjoy the next piece.

sen.j: ガリを醤油につけ、それを寿司に乗せて食べる、という寿司の食べ方もある。
sen.e: Another way to eat gari is to dip it in soy source and put it on sushi.
Another way to eat gari is to dip it in soy source and put it on sushi.
Another way to eat gari is to dip it in soy source and put it on sushi.
Word origin
Word Origin
sen.cmt: origin を Origin に修正しました。
sen.e: Word Origin

sen.j: 食感がガリガリするところから、あるいはショウガを刃物で薄く削るときにガリガリと音がするところからこの名がついた。
sen.e: It is called gari because it has rasping touch or when you cut ginger with a knife it makes a rasping sound.
It is called "gari" because it has rasping touch or when you cut ginger with a knife it makes a rasping sound.
sen.cmt: gari にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。
sen.e: It is called "gari" because it has rasping touch or when you cut ginger with a knife it makes a rasping sound.

sen.j: いずれも醤油をムラサキ、酢飯をシャリ、茶をアガリと呼ぶのと同じ寿司屋の符牒であるため、本来は客が使うべきではない言葉であるが、普通名詞として一般化している。
sen.e: The name is a jargon of sushi shop such where they call soy sauce murasaki, vinegared rice shari, or green tea agari, and originally, it is not a word to be used by customers but it became to be used as a common noun.
sen.cmt: 文末が欠けていましたので、Webサイトから追加しました。
sen.e: The name is a jargon of sushi restaurant where they call soy sauce "murasaki," vinegared rice "shari," or green tea "agari," thus it is not originally a word to be used by customers; however, it has become popular as a common noun.

The name is a jargon of sushi restaurant where they call soy sauce "murasaki," vinegared rice "shari," or green tea "agari," thus it is not originally a word to be used by customers; however, it has become popular as a common noun.
Pharmacological effects
Pharmacological Effects
sen.cmt: effects を Effects に修正しました。
sen.e: Pharmacological Effects

sen.j: 生姜には殺菌効果があり食中毒を防ぐ効果がある。
sen.e: It is said that ginger kills germs and prevents food poisoning.
It is said that ginger kills germs and prevents food poisoning.
It is said that ginger kills germs and prevents food poisoning.

sen.j: また、生魚は身体を冷やすが、生姜の辛味成分「ジンゲロール」は健胃・発汗作用があり、身体を温める効果がある。
sen.e: Raw fish cools your body but the pungent component, "Gingerol," of ginger has stomachic and sudorific properties and warms your body.
Raw fish cools your body but 'gingerol,' a pungent ingredient of ginger has stomachic and sudorific properties and warms your body.
sen.cmt: the pungent component, "Gingerol," of ginger を'gingerol,' a pungent ingredient of ginger に修正しました。
sen.e: Raw fish cools your body but 'gingerol,' a pungent ingredient of ginger has stomachic and sudorific properties and warms your body.
Color
Color
Color

sen.j: 新生姜で製するガリは特に色素を入れなくても酢の作用でピンク色に色づく。
sen.e: Gari made of newly harvested ginger turns pink without adding pigment due to vinegar action.
Gari made of newly harvested ginger turns pink without coloring due to the action of vinegar.
sen.cmt: adding pigment を coloring に修正しました。vinegar action を the action of vinegar に修正しました。
sen.e: Gari made of newly harvested ginger turns pink without coloring due to the action of vinegar.

sen.j: ひね生姜の場合はほとんど色づかない。
sen.e: Hine-shoga (old ginger) does not rarely color.
In case of old ginger, it rarely changes its color.
In case of old ginger, it rarely changes its color.

sen.j: しかし、商業上の理由から天然色素や人工着色料を使って色をつけて売られているものが多い。
sen.e: However, for commercial reasons, gari that is colored with natural pigments or artificial colors is often sold.
However, for commercial reasons, gari that is colored with natural or artificial food coloring is often sold.
sen.cmt: natural pigments or artificial colors をnatural or artificial food coloring に修正しました。
sen.e: However, for commercial reasons, gari that is colored with natural or artificial food coloring is often sold.

sen.j: 色をつけていない生姜の色そのままのガリも存在する。
sen.e: There is also gari that uses the natural color of ginger.
There is also gari of ginger with its original color.
sen.cmt: that uses 以下を全文修正しました。
sen.e: There is also gari of ginger with its original color.
